entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is navigating through a route. He is described as running into dead ends and taking wrong turns.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned by Harry, but his presence is not explicitly described in this passage.

entities.name: blast-ended skrewt
entities.description: The Blast-Ended Skrewt is a giant scorpion-like creature that Harry encounters. It has a long sting and thick armor.

relationships.description: Harry encounters the Blast-Ended Skrewt while navigating through the route. He points his wand at it and casts a spell.
